previous.title: A week ago, the $VIX saw its 3rd largest single-day spike in history (+62%). All of that increase has been erased as of today's close with volatility moving sharply lower. https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo

localize.full_text: 一周前，美元VIX指数出现了历史上第3大单日飙升（+62%）。截至今日收盘，所有的涨幅都被抹去，波动率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。
一週前，美元VIX指數出現了歷史上第3大單日飆升（+62%）。截至今日收盤，所有的漲幅都被抹去，波動率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。
